template_description: Template for cataloging existing components in bottom-up integration approach

inventory_metadata.inventory_purpose: REPLACE_WITH_PURPOSE (e.g., 'Integrate 10 Python packages into unified auth system')

components.component_type: python_package | npm_package | microservice | legacy_system | library | module | api_service
components.tier_justification: EXPLAIN: Why this component belongs at this tier

source_location.type: github | gitlab | bitbucket | filesystem | package_registry | container_registry

exposed_interfaces.interface_type: python_api | rest_api | grpc_api | graphql_api | message_queue | database | file_system | cli
exposed_interfaces.protocol: http | grpc | amqp | kafka | postgresql | mongodb | filesystem

functions_or_endpoints.name: function_name() | /api/endpoint
functions_or_endpoints.signature: def function_name(arg1: type1, arg2: type2) -> return_type | GET /api/endpoint?param=value
functions_or_endpoints.purpose: Brief description of what this function/endpoint does

exposed_interfaces.openapi_spec: OPTIONAL: Path to OpenAPI/Swagger spec file

consumed_interfaces.required_for: Brief description of why this dependency exists
consumed_interfaces.fallback_behavior: OPTIONAL: What happens if this dependency is unavailable

constraints.language: python | javascript | java | go | rust | typescript
deployment_constraints: CONSTRAINT_1: e.g., Requires GPU for ML inference
CONSTRAINT_2: e.g., Must run on same network as legacy_db

integration_readiness.breaking_change_policy: OPTIONAL: Description of how breaking changes are handled
integration_readiness.deprecation_timeline: OPTIONAL: If component is being deprecated

components.analysis_notes: REPLACE_WITH_NOTES: Any observations about this component
integration_recommendations: RECOMMENDATION_1: E.g., Add async support before integration
RECOMMENDATION_2: E.g., Upgrade to latest version for security fixes

component_relationships.description: Component A calls Component B's REST API for user authentication
issues: ISSUE: E.g., Component A uses deprecated API version

next_steps: Complete integration_requirements.json to define integration goals
Run analyze_integration_gaps.py to identify integration issues
Review components with low analysis_confidence for deeper analysis

INSTRUCTIONS.purpose: This template is used in bottom-up systems engineering (workflow step BU-01) to catalog existing components that need to be integrated
INSTRUCTIONS.when_to_use: When starting with existing components (packages, services, systems) and need to integrate them into a cohesive system
how_to_fill: 1. List all components that will be part of the integrated system
2. For each component, analyze its capabilities, interfaces, and constraints
3. Identify tier classification (is it a system, service, component, or module?)
4. Document all exposed interfaces (APIs, functions, endpoints)
5. Document all consumed interfaces (dependencies on other components)
6. Assess integration readiness (is it ready to integrate or needs work?)
7. Set analysis_confidence based on depth of analysis (high=full source review, low=documentation only)
